block.p: Mallika Soy Bhatnagar, the daughter of Soledad Bhatnagar and Dr. Rajesh Bhatnagar of New City, N.Y., was married there last evening to Dr. Sunil Prakash Malhotra, the son of Asha Malhotra and Dr. Suraj Malhotra of Hyde Park, N.Y. Pandit Baljeet Shastri performed a Hindu ceremony at the Dellwood Country Club.

Mrs. Malhotra, 27, is an account supervisor at the San Francisco office of the DDB Worldwide Communications Group, the advertising agency. She graduated from the University of Michigan and received a master's degree in integrated marketing from Emerson College. Her father is a pediatrician in Congers, N.Y., and the bride's mother is a registered nurse in his office.

Pandit Baljeet Shastri performed a Hindu ceremony at the Dellwood Country Club.

Mrs. Malhotra, 27, is an account supervisor at the San Francisco office of the DDB Worldwide Communications Group, the advertising agency. Her father is a pediatrician in Congers, N.Y., and the bride's mother is a registered nurse in his office.

Dr. Malhotra, 28, after two years as a resident in general surgery at New York University Medical Center, is on leave as a research fellow in cardiothoracic surgery at the University of California at San Francisco. His father, a thoracic surgeon, practices in Hyde Park, and the bridegroom's mother manages his office.
